  </identifier>

    <catalog>expression-cmr-id</catalog>

  </identifier>
  <description>
    <facet>
      <vocabularyID>LRE.expressionDescriptionFacetValues</vocabularyID>
      <value>main</value>
    </facet>
    <metadata>
      <schema>http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM</schema>
      <lom xsi:schemaLocation="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/lomv1.0/lomLoose.xsd" xmlns="http://ltsc.ieee.org/xsd/LOM">
        <general>
          <identifier>
            <catalog>oercommons.org</catalog>
            <entry>1770208971</entry>
          </identifier>
          <title>
            <string language="en">Transverse and Longitudinal Waves</string>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Quer- und Längswellen</string>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Vagues transversales et longitudinales</string>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Ondas transversais e longitudinais</string>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Onde trasversali e longitudinali</string>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Εγκάρσια και διαμήκη κύματα</string>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Ondas transversales y longitudinales</string>
          </title>
          <description>
            <string language="en">For middle school and up, a short explanation of the difference between transverse and longitudinal waves, with some suggestions for classroom presentation.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="en">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <language>en</language>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Für mittlere Schule und up, eine kurze 
Erklärung des Unterschiedes zwischen die Quer- und Längswellen, mit 
einigen Vorschlägen für Klassenzimmerdarstellung.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Pour le collège et levez, une explication courte
de la différence entre les vagues transversales et longitudinales, 
avec quelques suggestions pour la présentation de salle de classe.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Para a escola média e levante, uma explanação 
curta da diferença entre ondas transversais e longitudinais, com 
algumas sugestões para a apresentação da sala de aula.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Per la scuola centrale ed aumenti, una 
spiegazione corta della differenza fra le onde trasversali e 
longitudinali, con alcuni suggerimenti per la presentazione dell'aula.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Για τη δευτεροβάθμια εκπαίδευση και επάνω, μια σύντομη
εξήγηση της διαφοράς μεταξύ των εγκάρσιων και διαμήκων κυμάτων, 
με μερικές προτάσεις για την παρουσίαση τάξεων.</string>
          </description>
          <description>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Para la escuela media y suba, una explicación 
corta de la diferencia entre las ondas transversales y longitudinales,
con algunas sugerencias para la presentación de la sala de clase.</string>
          </description>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-de">Künste</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-fr">Arts</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-pt">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-it">Arti</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-el">Τέχνες</string>
          </keyword>
          <keyword>
            <string language="x-mt-es">Artes</string>
          </keyword>
        </general>

      </lom>
    </metadata>
  </description>
